name: New Thought / No Thought
description: "New Thought / No Thought" is a short film (2:49 min.) produced in 2020 by award-winning filmmaker and multidisciplinary artist Kira Bursky (All Around Artsy). A drawing realizes she is living on a piece of paper and experiences a shift in her consciousness. Kira created this film using projection mapping techniques with her Lightform setup. The new collector will receive an HD file of the film as well as an optional physical print of a screenshot from the film. To learn more visit: www.allaroundartsy.com
